p: ConA and Lps are effective mitogens that promote lymphocyte transformation. This experiment confirmed the synergistic effect of S. chinensis polysaccharides and ConA or Lps cells. The role of ConA and Lps was to proliferate more than twice as much as the polysaccharides ( Table 5). Meanwhile, adding polysaccharides and ConA or Lps cells significantly increased lymphocyte proliferation capacity. The synergistic effect of S. chinensis polysaccharides with the Lps cells was about 1.5 times better than that with the ConA cells.
